comment._content: the building to the right is erichsens palais (1797-1799) by c.f.harsdorff, architect (1735-1799). recent shot of it here: www.flickr.com/photos/seier/2439481234/

comment._content:
Would like to find Anne Larsson who used to work at the Royal Theatre. Also, her mother, Mitzi Larsson, worked there. We are coming to Copenhagen next week and would like to find Anne or Mitzi. 

Thanks!
